author: MZ_1
title: Ekimu Falcon - Agil
review:
This is my next LEGO magazine. I was never interested in the Bionicle, but I was delighted with the bird's design.

Packaging / Instructions
The set is packed in a plastic bag, for single use. There are 2 instructions in the magazine: one for building a falcon and one for attaching to Ekimu's shoulder.

Minifigs
There are no minifigs included, so I'll go straight to the parts.

Parts
There are a lot of Technic parts here, as befits a Bionicle set, but the highlight of the set are the golden parts: beautiful wings, tail and beak.

Overall
This is a great LEGO bird design. As a big Chima fan, I took it because of some similarities to eagles and phoenixes. The set has a feature to attach a falcon on the arm of the Mask Maker, which unfortunately I couldn't test, but I think is cool. It is great both as an addition to the #71312 and as a standalone display model.
